summary: This mod adds,as the title suggests, more types of arrows to your game. And, as the title suggests, theses arrows are everything but lore-friendly.
descriptionHtml:
[b]~~~Non-immersive arrows?~~~[/b] 
Yep,this mod adds 5 new types of craftable arrows to your game(if you download it,duh),all with more or less balanced crafting recipes: 
-[b]Mr. Forest[/b] (Pine Trees) 
-[b]Pota-doom[/b] (Potatoes) 
-[b]Che Ogorath[/b] (Cheese wheels) 
-[b]Imperial bows[/b] (What do you expect?) 
-[b]Hammertime![/b] (Daedric Warhammer O_o) 
Makes sense,I know. 

[b]~~~~~~~~[u]Need I say more?[/u]~~~~~~~~[/b] 
Actually,yes. 
[u]Mr. Forest:[/u] 
-Stick them to NPCs or stick them to the ground,they'll behave like normal arrows.Sadly,[b]they're not solid[/b] 

[u]Pota-doom:[/u] 
-Kids,don't eat your vegetables,[b]they explode on contact![/b] 
-These don't stick at all,obviously. 

[u]Che Ogorath:[/u] 
-Sounds noble,is cheese,for everyone. 
-Sticks to terrain,sticks to your followers,sticks to your enemies.Even sticks to neutral NPCs,isn't that amazing? 

[u]Imperial bows:[/u] 
-I felt like they're pretty useless,and when did you ever get a chance to shoot bows? 
-Works best in close combat,[b]aim to the right of your target,they're a bit offset[/b] 

[u]Hammertime!:[/u] 
-Get hit,get hammered! 
-I know they're hard to come by,so they do 50 damage each 
-Like the Imperial bows,they fly straight past the side of your target.It takes some practice to get used to it. 

[b]~~~~~~~~[b]P[/b]reemptively-[b]A[/b]nswered-[b]Q[/b]uestions(PAQ)~~~~~~~~[/b] 
[i]Where do I find them?[/i] 
-At your friendly neighborhood forge 

[i]Why is it not working![/i] 
-You didn't install it properly? Try placing it at the bottom of your load order.
author: McBook
